tool_description: Analyzes precipitation patterns, intensity, and distribution to assess water availability and flood/drought risks for agricultural planning.

precipitation_data.description: Array of precipitation measurements in millimeters

time_period_days.description: Number of days covered by the precipitation data (7-365)

crop_water_needs.description: Weekly crop water requirement in millimeters

error_messages: Insufficient precipitation data: Need at least 10 data points for meaningful analysis.
Invalid time period: Time period must be between 7 and 365 days.
Invalid crop water needs: Weekly water requirement must be between 5 and 100 mm.
Data inconsistency: Number of precipitation data points should match the specified time period.
usage: Provide precipitation data array and corresponding time period. Optional crop water needs help assess adequacy. Returns precipitation statistics and water balance assessment.

intensity_category.description: Overall precipitation intensity: low, normal, or high

water_balance.description: Water balance status: deficit, adequate, or surplus
